data.price: He said, “My Lord, reassure my heart for me,
and ease my task for me,
and loosen the knot from my tongue[8],
data.footnotes: [8] When Moses (ﷺ) was being tested by Pharaoh, he took an amber and put it in his mouth, which hindered his speech when he grew up. So, he asked Allah to help him overcome this hurdle, and Allah answered his prayer.

data.price: so that they may understand my speech.

dua.name: Dua for Mental Clarity
dua.significanceReason: Requests divine assistance in achieving mental clarity, understanding, and effective communication.
